chapter_description.p: The Dynamic Link module enables Nelson to build, load, and call C/C++ and Fortran code at runtime.
It supports generating gateways, loaders, and managing shared libraries for integration with external compiled code.
By default, Nelson does not try to detect a C/C++ compiler on Windows. Do not forget to run 'configuremsvc' or 'configuremingw' once.

keyword.name: Build C/C++ code on the fly
keyword.description: Build C/C++ code on the fly

keyword.name: libpointer datatype
keyword.description: C/Nelson equivalent data types

keyword.name: cmake
keyword.description: call CMake tool

keyword.name: configuremingw
keyword.description: Configure Nelson to use MinGW as default C compiler

keyword.name: configuremsvc
keyword.description: Configure Nelson to use visual studio as default compiler

keyword.name: dlcall
keyword.description: C or Fortran Foreign function call.

keyword.name: dlclose
keyword.description: Removes dllib object.

keyword.name: dlgeneratecleaner
keyword.description: Generates cleaner.m file for C++ gateway.

keyword.name: dlgenerategateway
keyword.description: Generates C++ gateway.

keyword.name: dlgenerateloader
keyword.description: Generates loader.m file for C++ gateway.

keyword.name: dlgeneratemake
keyword.description: Generates a makefile for building a dynamic library.

keyword.name: dlgenerateunloader
keyword.description: Generates unloader.m file for C++ gateway.

keyword.name: dlgetnelsonincludes
keyword.description: Returns paths of Nelson include directories.

keyword.name: dlgetnelsonlibraries
keyword.description: Returns paths to Nelson library files.

keyword.name: dllib_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used dllib handle.

keyword.name: dllibinfo
keyword.description: Returns list of available symbols in an shared library.

keyword.name: dllibisloaded
keyword.description: Checks if shared library is loaded.

keyword.name: dlmake
keyword.description: call make or nmake tool

keyword.name: dlopen
keyword.description: Loads an dynamic library.

keyword.name: dlsym
keyword.description: Loads a C/Fortran symbol for an dynamic library.

keyword.name: dlsym_delete
keyword.description: Removes dlsym object.

keyword.name: dlsym_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used dlsym handle.

keyword.name: findcmake
keyword.description: find CMake path.

keyword.name: getdynlibext
keyword.description: Returns the extension of dynamic libraries.

keyword.name: havecompiler
keyword.description: Detect if a C/C++ compiler is configured.

keyword.name: libpointer
keyword.description: Creates an C pointer object usuable in Nelson.

keyword.name: libpointer_delete
keyword.description: Removes libpointer object.

keyword.name: libpointer_isNull
keyword.description: Checks if libpointer handle points on NULL pointer.

keyword.name: libpointer_plus
keyword.description: plus operator on libpointer handle.

keyword.name: libpointer_reshape
keyword.description: Reshapes libpointer dimensions.

keyword.name: libpointer_setdatatype
keyword.description: Set type of an libpointer handle.

keyword.name: libpointer_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used libpointer handle.

keyword.name: loadcompilerconf
keyword.description: load compiler configuration.

keyword.name: removecompilerconf
keyword.description: Remove used compiler configuration (on Windows).

keyword.name: vswhere
keyword.description: Locate Visual Studio 2017, 2019 and newer installations
